<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return value of [[Eden_Editor:_Scenario_Atttributes|scenario attribute]]. For a list of all available mission attributes see [[Eden_Editor:_Setting_Attributes#Scenario|Mission Attributes]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Attributes are available only within the Eden Editor workspace. You cannot access them in scenario preview or exported scenario!</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> section '''get3DENMissionAttribute''' class
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> section: [[String]] - attribute section
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - attribute name
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[systemChat]] [[str]] ("Multiplayer" [[get3DENMissionAttribute]] "respawn");</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> 
[[set3DENMissionAttributes]]
</value></part></template>
